name: Babette Bamboo Slip
description: The Babette Slip is made using a luxuriously soft and lightweight bamboo jersey with sheer mesh panelling on the side. The shoulder straps are adjustable and made of high quality Japanese elastic. The slip also has soft elastic edging, ensuring that it can be worn comfortably in bed. The bamboo jersey is made of 95% bamboo and 5% spandex and will retain its stretch. Please refer to our Size Guide to ensure the best possible fit. If you are between sizes we recommend sizing down for this style. NOTE: This item is Made to Order, so please allow 3–8 weeks for your item to be shipped. All Hopeless Lingerie items are proudly handmade with love in Melbourne, Australia.
